mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bookings (location_number, id_client, client, id_agency, agency, price, id_type, room, id_hotel, hotel, check_in, room_nights) VALUES (#{location_number}, #{id_client}, #{client}, #{id_agency}, #{agency}, #{price}, #{id_type}, #{room}, #{id_hotel}, #{hotel}, #{check_in}, #{room_nights})
mapper.update: UPDATE bookings SET location_number = #{location_number}, id_client = #{id_client}, client = #{client}, id_agency = #{id_agency}, agency = #{agency}, price = #{price}, id_type = #{id_type}, room = #{room}, id_hotel = #{id_hotel}, hotel = #{hotel}, check_in = #{check_in}, room_nights = #{room_nights} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT location_number FROM bookings ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1
